title: Peach and Nectarine Muffins
ingredients: ['200g plain flour', '150g caster sugar', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '75ml vegetable oil', '1 egg', '75ml milk', '1 large ripe peach - peeled, stone removed and diced', '1 very ripe nectarine, stone removed and diced', '1 tablespoon dark brown soft sugar']
